name: Totally Not Doom
description:
3D cel-shading in Unity, demonstrated through a Doom-like third person shooter. 

Traverse through the enemy base and fight your way through hoards of killer robots. Get the required number of kills to advance to the next level, while also racking up as many points as possible!

Controls

Movement - WASD

Aiming - Mouse

Shoot Shotgun - Left Click

Punch - E or Right Click

Note: Killing enemies with the shotgun grants 10 points. If enemies are punched, they grant 30 points upon death. Enemies also have a chance of dropping health pills, which can be used to restore your health.

 Created by Henry La, Lena Jeon, Kevin Ponce, and Hamza Mohammed.
